nodes.text: A club, also known as a cudgel, was a type of blunt weapon found in the galaxy. Clubs were used by the Talz of Orto Plutonia, and the Tusken Raiders of Tatooine used bladed clubs known as gaderffii sticks. The Quarren also used clubs to attack members of the Resistance while they were on a mission on Mon Cala, but to no avail.
